publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4327 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Stirling Schools PPP—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling Council and the Scottish Executive on the completion of the agreements for the £100 million Stirling schools PPP contract and on making unprecedented levels of investment for future generations in Scotland by providing modern, stimulating and innovative learning and teaching facilities for children and young people.

S2M-4327 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Stirling Schools PPP—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling Council and the Scottish Executive on the completion of the agreements for the £100 million Stirling schools PPP contract and on making unprecedented levels of investment for future generations in Scotland by providing modern, stimulating and innovative learning and teaching facilities for children and young people.
S2M-4327 Stirling Schools PPP (lodged on 2 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4327 Stirling Schools PPP (lodged on 2 May 2006) Jackie Baillie*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-4327 Stirling Schools PPP (lodged on 2 May 2006) Dr Elaine Murray*, Sarah Boyack*
